name: Protected Storage Service Access
description: Detects access to a protected_storage service over the network. Potential abuse of DPAPI to extract domain backup keys from Domain Controllers
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:Security AND event.code:5145 AND winlog.event_data.ShareName:*IPC* AND winlog.event_data.RelativeTargetName:protected_storage)`
